name: Just Like Stuffed Baked Potatoes
ingredients: 3 pieces bacon, chopped and fried until crisp
utensils: 8 x 8 inch baking pan or 2-quart casserole

instructions.en: Cook frozen cauliflower until soft, about 8-10 minutes
instructions.sk: Varte mrazený karfiol do mäkka, asi 8-10 minút
instructions.ja: 冷凍カリフラワーを柔らかくなるまで8〜10分ほど調理する

instructions.en: Drain cauliflower very well and break up florets a bit with a spoon
instructions.sk: Karfiol dobre sceďte a lyžicou trochu rozlámte ružičky
instructions.ja: カリフラワーの水気をよく切り、スプーンで小花を少し砕く

instructions.en: Place cauliflower in a greased 8 x 8 inch baking pan or 2-quart casserole
instructions.sk: Vložte karfiol do vymastenej 20 x 20 cm zapekacej formy alebo 2-litrovej zapekacej misy
instructions.ja: カリフラワーを油を塗った20cm四方の焼き皿または2クォートのキャセロールに入れる

instructions.en: Mix in softened cream cheese, shredded cheddar, chopped green onions, salt, pepper, and crispy bacon
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte zmäknutý krémový syr, strúhaný čedar, nasekanú jarnú cibuľku, soľ, korenie a chrumkavú slaninu
instructions.ja: 柔らかくしたクリームチーズ、シュレッドチェダー、刻んだ青ネギ、塩、コショウ、カリカリのベーコンを混ぜ合わせる

instructions.en: Optionally, dust the top with paprika
instructions.ja: 必要に応じて、上からパプリカをふりかける

instructions.en: Oven method: Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 20-40 minutes, until browned and bubbly
instructions.sk: Metóda v rúre: Pečte pri 175°C 20-40 minút, kým nezhnedne a nebuble
instructions.ja: オーブン調理法：350°F（175°C）で20〜40分、茶色くなり泡立つまで焼く

instructions.en: Microwave method: Cook loosely covered for about 40 minutes on 50% power, turning the dish after 20 minutes
instructions.sk: Metóda v mikrovlnnej rúre: Varte voľne prikryté asi 40 minút na 50% výkone, po 20 minútach otočte nádobu
instructions.ja: 電子レンジ調理法：50％の出力で約40分、緩く覆って加熱し、20分後に皿を回転させる
